title: Did Miriam Webster update her definition of "racism" to say that only white people are racist?
subtitle: The American dictionary announced that it would revise its introduction to racism in June 2020 after receiving a request from a young black woman.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In June 2020, Miriam Webster said that she planned to change her entry to "racialism" in her dictionary just to show that white people were racist.
